website_summaries.verdict: Despite a few quirks, this is an affordable yet beautiful urn that proves you don't have to spend a lot for a dignified resting place for your loved one.
pros: An affordable urn with a simplistic, attractive design that comes in several colors
Quite inexpensive compared to options available at funeral homes, yet isn't "cheap" looking
cons: Material is sturdy but somewhat lightweight
The lid fits loosely, which will be a concern for anyone who prefers a more secure fit

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color exactly as pictured in product description. A well made quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the quality of this product. The Urn arrived quickly as promised and in perfect condition. I found the color to be exactly as pictured with a quality finish. It's well made, beautiful color and easily held the remains of a 6'3" 220lb man. I would highly recommend this product. Also, previous reviews stated that the lid didn't secure tightly. I did not find this to be true with my urn.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Does not seal...???!
customer_reviews.text: Rewrapped and returned immediately upon opening. This is VERY lightweight urn (coffee can?) and the lid just barely twists on without actually sealing. I was attracted by the shape and bronze color because I have a bronze statue to attach to the lid, but this would have turned over and spilled with the least disturbance. The price should have been a clue, but it wasn't even worth $40 to me. Sorry. Shipping was rapid and the velvet bag was a nice plus.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie O'

customer_reviews.title: A great simple urn choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this urn for my mother's ashes. She loved the Dodgers so I chose the blue one. The presentation is very nice when the package arrived. The urn is the size and expected and looks nice. Good quaility. I do notice the issues some people mentioned with the lid not sealing, but mine actually has a decent seal, it is not that easy to get off. A little craft glue could seal it if you needed to. It looks nice up on the shelf. Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: The urn is good for the money
customer_reviews.text: The urn is good for the money. It will definitely serve our purpose. Ordered white for me and my husband chose silver. The paint on the lid of the silver one was uneven or discolored. However, not terribly noticeable. This lid does not fit tightly either. Will need to be sealed with something when used. Also, order took 9 days to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in anticipation of my mother's passing; she is in hospice care here at home. The urn is very nice, although the lid does not "lock" exactly, but I like that. It is larger than I thought it would be and I am thinking mom and dad (he is in a simple box) might fit into this one container provided my brother agrees (their ashes will be in separate bags and will stay that way). It was reasonably priced in my opinion, having checked the funeral home's selection; a box like my father's was priced at $165 and this is much nicer looking than the simple gold box.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Rice

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this! Simple & clean, nice design, right size, quality construction. I loved it in white from other's photos.
customer_reviews.author: LORI KELSEY

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 150 Bouvier des Flandres. Great color and seal is perfect. The purple color is gorgeous. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: BouvierChick

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!! This is one of the cheapest Urns I’ve ever seen in my life. The top DOES NOT lock! This was purchased as a temporary Urn and was supposed to travel. Now with the loose lid I have to purchase another Urn! Huge waste of $40!!!!
customer_reviews.author: John&Mat

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with product!
customer_reviews.text: I left giftable blank because the product is a urn for my ashes when I pass away and I'm in no hurry, just making all the arrangements ahead, hopefully WAY ahead. I'm very impressed with product and the protection of the bubble wrap preventing damage. The price is very reasonable, probably about 1/3 the cost at a funeral parlor.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnybgood

customer_reviews.title: Almost great
customer_reviews.text: The product is very good value for the money, looks nice and was packed very nicely. The only problem was the lid was loose. There were several felt ring seals but were not enough to hold the lid on tightly. I had to go to Lowes and acquire one additional large rubber seal to make a tight fit. Not a big problem or cost, but more of a hassle. It was not worth the time and effort to get the vendor to send me additional felt ring seals to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ls

customer_reviews.title: if i could give this zero stars i would. ...
customer_reviews.text: if i could give this zero stars i would...DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT...the lid will not...and never will...close properly...it dosent lock down...if it falls over the ashes are out...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with product. Nice rich brown. Quick ship. Top is loose but can be sealed shut with bead of gel-type super glue on top edge before securing the lid over it. Advice given by funeral director, greatly appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: L. Waterbury

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: The quality was superb, but it was larger than I thought it would be to share my mother's ashes.
customer_reviews.author: CarmenE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My brother was always obsessed with Batman. I bought this black urn and then an expensive Batman sticker to attach to the side. My brother would be very happy if he was here to see it. It doesn’t really even look like a typical urn. Which is nice because some people might be freaked out by me keeping him in the living room with us.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L Lee

customer_reviews.title: Loose lid. Pretty and clean.
customer_reviews.text: I like this urn for the most part. I bought it so I could have something to keep my dads remains in temporarily until his ashes were spread. I didn't like the top at all. It wobbles and is very loose. You would need to have it sealed if you plan on keeping the ashes inside for some time. I accidentally ordered three of these and had no issues in refunding the other two. So that helped to bump up my star rating for my review.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected but who cares it’s only for ashes... cost for item is a little high for what you get. They are a bit large. Painted jars is all they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This urn is just what I was looking for. I can't believe that I scored this find. It's unlike anything I have seen and I scoured numerous sites before finding this urn. Tip: If top seems loose fill with plastic and top will feel more secure.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive urn to use that was going inside an urn vault. This urn is so beautiful, big and sturdy I'm going to send the urn vault back. I plan on using glue E-8000 to seal the lid. Plus it came with a red velvet bag to place the ashes in and then another bag to place the urn in. Great value and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bronteshel

customer_reviews.title: Good choice at a decent price.
customer_reviews.text: I am a single child to a single mother. When she passed I did not have much financial support to work with to honor her. Urns when purchased through a funeral home are ridiculously expensive! So I purchased the perfect urn for her right here! The urn held all my mom's ashes and was a good choice for burying her with my other family. Cons: I don't think it would be a good mantle type urn. The lid does not lock and it is a medium quality porcelain that I could imagine breaking like a plate would.
customer_reviews.author: KATIE

customer_reviews.title: Looks good sitting in a room and is nice and "roomy."
customer_reviews.text: Nice product for the price. Looks good and would fit in with any decor. As a note, the lid would not pass being buried in the ground without being sealed as it does not seal 100% airtight. This would be perfect as a "service" urn for a loved one to rest in during a memorial service.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja S.

customer_reviews.title: Great look and value.
customer_reviews.text: My wife did not want a big 'production' when she passed so a simple urn like this was perfect. She loved purple so when I saw this lavender one it fit her desires beautifully. Being married to a vet she is resting in a National Cemetery in a columbarium and the size of this urn was ideal for the space provided. We will fit side by side in the allotted space which is why I purchased my brown one at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: kcd

customer_reviews.title: I love the color purple
customer_reviews.text: I love the color purple! This urn is bigger than I thought it would be. The packaging was great! It came in a big box and inside the urn was in another box. When I opened the smaller box, the urn was wrapped in bubble wrap and it was enclosed in two drawstring bags. One bag was a purple suede bag and the second bag was a white cloth bag.
customer_reviews.author: Graham the Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: the shape is elegant and beautiful. I purchased this urn for my mother. She was very talented and artistic so I bought the white urn so that I can paint on it. I spray painted it with a primer went at it with paints and it holds up great! The shoe of the urn also looks grate when designed. Very happy with this product. My mother looks beautiful ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Great urn! It's a wonderful piece to help in the healing process of my dad. He would've loved the way it looks, and loved that I chose it for him.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Shields

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased to temporarily hold my mom's ashes before they are to be dispersed. The price was very reasonable and it is good quality and was delivered as expected. The color is very vivid and was the deciding factor in it's purchase.(my mom's favorite color) When the situation arises I will purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: CmStJ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you're looking for.
customer_reviews.text: In lieu of my father's death I, as I'm sure many of you were, was worried about buying an urn online. I would have been devastated if the product wasn't up to snuff and it is already an emotionally and financially trying time for me. Therefore, I was grateful and relieved to find that this quiet, reserved urn was exactly what I was looking for. There's no catch, no feeling of being ripped off. It was exactly what I ordered and I am eternally grateful that I could check this off of my list of worries in this trying time.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Wellesley

customer_reviews.title: Lid does not screw tight- it jiggles.
customer_reviews.text: This is an urn for human cremation ashes. The lid does not screw on tight. It jiggles when on all the way. I have already started the return process.
customer_reviews.author: A Town

customer_reviews.title: On another dark day, I will gladly order from them again
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother in law. It is a gorgeous piece that will be displayed in my home to keep her ashes in. The packaging was very nice, not only to ensure that it did not get damaged, but it felt like they cared when they sent this. Losing her was a very hard day for me & my family, however having a beautiful urn for her ashes and one I know she would love, is a blessing. thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Marks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I read numerous reviews before choosing this urn. I have half of my fiance’s ashes, a 208 lb man. I did not want to dump them from the bag. I could not get them to fit inside with the bag as the neck/opening was too small. I tried several ways and it just wouldn’t work. Very disappointed in an already devastating series of events.
customer_reviews.author: Janet B

customer_reviews.title: Hope to wait a while to use it!
customer_reviews.text: I am trying to get my Mom's affairs in order and ordered the urn for the eventuality. Don't know when it'll be used! Maybe for me first at the rate I'm going!
customer_reviews.author: K B Huddleston

customer_reviews.title: Classic and perfect in loving memory of a husband and father
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this urn for my daughter and granddaughter to place their husband and father’s ashes. It is classic and understated. It is perfect. They ceremoniously placed it on their mantle. It has given them closure and strength to be able to see it and smile remembering his life.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia D.

customer_reviews.title: Smart choice Urn
customer_reviews.text: I like the appearance of the urn. Very pretty, but I didn't like the fact that it doesn't close securely. I actually had to superglue the top to the base to make sure the ashes stayed in.
customer_reviews.author: Jill L. Brinker

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this
customer_reviews.text: The description indicated the top would close securely. It does not close tightly, it is very loose and would not b appropriate for loose ashes. I had to leave them in the plastic bag. Would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Toomey

customer_reviews.title: Lovely - Better Than Described
customer_reviews.text: The blue is a lovely color (my aunt's favorite color), and the urn arrived just as promised. Packaged really well. The name plate the I ordered should arrive later this week.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice urn, great value and looks nice too
customer_reviews.text: It was nice. I bought this for my uncle's ashes. Great value for the price. I got many compliments on it. Also came nicely packed and in two drawstring bags to protect it. I got the black but it was kinda like a dark titanium color. It was nice and affordable. And I think he would like it and he is finally in peace
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Tasteful, affordable and sturdy urn
customer_reviews.text: I used this product as a temporary place for a small amount of ashes from my fathers cremation. The ashes were given to me after the services in a plastic bag in a plastic box and it seemed unfitting to keep the ashes in a well “ inadequate” container until we are able to spread his ashes on his birthday at a pond he loved to fish at. I wanted a more appropriate container until we spread his ashes but did not want to spend a serious amount of money for the temporary nature of the situation. The urn is tasteful, sturdy, and looks very nice for it’s affordable price
customer_reviews.author: NoJo

customer_reviews.title: Very Classy Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. The perfect way to preserve ashes. We originally was going to spread mom’s ashes but after the funeral decided not to. The funeral home had given us had remains in a box. I bought this online and it came in a very nice velvet bag. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: DMP

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for an urn for almost a year. I couldn't afford to pay the high prices. I finally found this one and although it's not fancy it's practical. It's nice looking & inexpensive. I'm happy to have found it.
customer_reviews.author: W. O'Ferral

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had Funeral Home seal it with silicone. No problems. Ordered the engraved plate that was suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Rankin

customer_reviews.title: great value!
customer_reviews.text: very light weight. great value. carefully protected in delivery box. finish is beautiful
customer_reviews.author: mishka

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value And Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two urns for my parents who are currently pre-planning their funeral. They were very impressed with the quality of the urns for the price. They also appreciated how well they were packaged for delivery and the velvet bag enclosed. I would highly recommend this seller for their quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend who is keeping her mother's ashes in a coffee canister....and I am so excited to give this to her. Purple is her favorite color and this urn is gorgeous for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Renee

customer_reviews.title: what's up with that lid?
customer_reviews.text: The lid doesn't screw in place or lock down. It has these little notches that fit into these other little notches, which would work, if the lid didn't come off so easily. Like, tip it over and the ashes all fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Tinisha

customer_reviews.title: It looks decent.
customer_reviews.text: It Got this for my dog. I don’t know how it would fit human remains since my dog filled it a little under the top. The lid does not really seal just kind of turns on and you have to stop turning when it feels secure.
customer_reviews.author: Malaki2014

customer_reviews.title: The lid is sturdy enough which pleased the funeral director
customer_reviews.text: It's simple but elegant. The lid is sturdy enough which pleased the funeral director. I needed a plain one so that the grand kids can decorate it as a remembrance to their grand mother. And most importantly, the price was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: weather proof
customer_reviews.text: Dad's ashes need a new housing color matches house ? will it last?
customer_reviews.author: Claire Foster

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality. No need to spend hundreds of dollars that a funeral home charges you. This served its purpose for our belived one and the family.
customer_reviews.author: S. Casias

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: I was so pleasantly surprised at how nice this was and it came on time. Thank you very much I will recommend to the rest of my family
customer_reviews.author: matthew brockman

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: I do not like it because the lid doesn’t lock. I haven’t used it, or placed my mother’s cremains in it. I’m afraid it may fall over. I guess I’ll have to pay a little more for one with a locking lid.
customer_reviews.author: Acire Netert

customer_reviews.title: Brother
customer_reviews.text: It was for my younger brother, it was perfect and thank you.
customer_reviews.author: blackweb

customer_reviews.title: Great But !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with purchase ,it was perfect for my sister in law's ashes sits on shelf next to her husband's.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my Mom's ashes. Classic design, seems durable and definitely affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Fuzzy and warm

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for rememberance
customer_reviews.text: This urn was perfect for the memory of my sister. The urn was very ell constructed and while always have pleasant memories of her life.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what to say about an urn. It's for my mother's ashes and shes resting in it. I wish it came with engraving but I'm going to get an engraving plate to put on the front.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Fox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence ordering it but it’s perfect for my father’s ashes. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: It is made very well. It’s rather large and will accommodate someone around 350 pounds. It looks very nice in person and seems like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Kelly McMurray

customer_reviews.title: Finish is actually not very good
customer_reviews.text: The item is fine. The finish inside and out are pretty cheap and disappointing. Good thing we just want them to place in the ground and not display.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vandervoord

customer_reviews.title: Makes for good burial urn
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal burial urn. From other comments I was aware that you couldn't seal it by twisting it tightly. We used silicone to seal it. That's about the only thing preventing it from five stars. Was good value compared to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: it is unbelievably perfect! I was surprised how pretty the gold color ...
customer_reviews.text: I received my urn today....it is unbelievably perfect! I was surprised how pretty the gold color was, with a white material bag and a lovely velvet looking bag.... Wonderful value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: AmyCha

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to a family member who was very happy to have some of his mother’s ashes with him. Very lovely.
customer_reviews.author: Travel one

customer_reviews.title: Great for cost...
customer_reviews.text: You get two bags one white one red felt it's large will hold way over the necessary size so we're happy
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Don't do it
customer_reviews.text: If you need the cheapest urn you can find, this is it. The lid isn't threaded. It is built extremely light. I was able to deform it with my hands. I absolutely recommend against buying this.
customer_reviews.author: William W. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with the purchase. I bought two in gold so that my brother could also give our loved one a proper home. The urn is made well, the top locks into place, and it displays well. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Embry

customer_reviews.title: Great value, beautiful urn
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, the lid doesn't close all the way but I just used some gorilla glue.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Blue...Well Made!.Did not make light , very solid..!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect size Urn. Not to large.Beautiful Blue color. Comes with a Red Velvet bag. It is also very affordable. We got a great product / Urn for a very sad time..Thank you for keeping the price down and quality FABULOUS. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: HH.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for my husband's memorial service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black urn for my husband's memorial s.ervice. I was able to leave his ashes in the bag from the crematorium and gently slide it through the top. It looked great with the all white and green floral arrangement I selected. I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very nice urn, packed in a felt drawstring bag and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice urn, packed in a felt drawstring bag and yet another soft material bag. It is more than I expected. Would recommend this company with high marks.
customer_reviews.author: Anneeoaklee

customer_reviews.title: Simple yet beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a little late but great packaging. Put my beloved father's ashes in it and looks great in the house, doesn't scream urn and that's what my family likes.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: his favorite color was blue
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my cousin who's husband passed away she really likes it loves the color, his favorite color was blue, I dont know if I can't be sealed. But it's nice and looks good on her mantel.
customer_reviews.author: Djwatley

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the color it holds the ashes very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my mother's cremains. Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron St. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Perfect price for a perfect Urn
customer_reviews.text: When I received the urn tears came to my eyes. Death is so sudden and costly, so when you do not have the money and you find an urn within your budget it just show someone wonder out there is on your side. From me and my family thank you so so much!!! So if someone is needing a simple urn and large enough to view at a wake or just keep an urn on your mantel it is perfect for both. Not everyone wants an overwhelming look of a traditional urn.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth nash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Urn
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful urn that comes with two protective bags- white cloth and red velvet. There was plenty of room in the urn for my father's ashes. This is a great product for the price. I would definitely purchase this item in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Paid twice the price for cardboard container to transport ashes home from crematorium.
customer_reviews.text: Price & uniqueness. Decided not to scatter spouse's ashes so purchased this urn permanence.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Brown

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful resting place
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this order. It was delivered on time and it was just what I expected. It is small but fits the ashes perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: theresa w

customer_reviews.title: Really good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really good product for the price. I had a buddy do vinyl lettering on it. Gonna look really good. If needed I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N. Solomonson

customer_reviews.title: Great value and size.
customer_reviews.text: Was a very good value. Nice size to! My sister was very over weight and most urns where 200 lbs or less. This has plenty of room and light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic Alumina Urn purchase
customer_reviews.text: We received quick delivery as promised, which was very important to us as we were leaving to travel the next day. Product was very good size and quality for price! We are very pleased with this purchase and vendor!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shea

customer_reviews.title: This was a great choice of the many options provided online
customer_reviews.text: This was a great choice of the many options provided online. It was tasteful and dignified item for its purpose and I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitri Santana

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my brother-in-law in the passing of his wife, my sister. Very masculine.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: but I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this yet, but I am very pleased with it. It came in a very beautiful velvet bag. I would buy again. It was delivered the next which was unbelievable fast. Thanks for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not made of brass like most urns for human cremains.
customer_reviews.text: This product was not sufficient enough to retain human remains. It was cute; however the thin metal was very light, unlike those made from brass. The top was too loose and did not seal properly either.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Hammond-Smith

customer_reviews.title: A worthwile purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this urn because it looked nice was affordable. When I received it it looked exactly like the pictures and was a great choice. I had no issues with delivery. Very thankful that the process was stress-free.
customer_reviews.author: byron a.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is very beautiful just like it was posted on the site. I
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burgundy color was beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my Uncle’s memorial and it was very nice. It held his ashes completely and looked nice where we had it. It’s not very thick, but sturdy enough to get the job done. For last minute order it was well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MJW03

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we expected.
customer_reviews.text: We are not in need of the urn right now, it's part of the pre-planning my mother is doing. She likes the size and the color. It's nice that it comes with a velvet bag.
customer_reviews.author: JCB

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't secure all that well
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize it was made out of thin tin metal I used it for its intended purpose
customer_reviews.author: Mike martin

customer_reviews.title: My urn was beautiful and just like the description
customer_reviews.text: My urn was beautiful and just like the description. The velvet bag was very nice. The ONLY improvement would be a screw on top as opposed to the notched one to insure closure. Thanks, Alicia Sandes in Giltedge, TN
customer_reviews.author: trouble2001

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and excellent quality Wonderful purchase during a difficult time. Thankyou
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Picture not true to color
customer_reviews.text: Instead of being a very iridescent rosy pink finish, this urn has a basic ceramic pottery finish in very pale pink...disappointing. Lid does not have a threaded seal.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money!
customer_reviews.text: The blue is beautiful. We have it sitting in our China cabinet with my brother in laws ashes in it! Beautiful display!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Nelson

customer_reviews.title: It was absolutely perfect for what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely perfect for what I was looking for. It came all wrapped up so it wouldn't break which was great and surprising. I definitely would recommend your company for sure. thank you again
customer_reviews.author: Marie Newell

customer_reviews.title: A very simple yet beautiful urn. It was a tough decision between the ...
customer_reviews.text: A very simple yet beautiful urn. It was a tough decision between the Black or the Blue, but we selected the Black and couldn't be more happy, especially considering the cost effective pricing. It stayed true to our Father's wishes and we Thank you. This a beautifully made urn. No imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The most important thing is that my mom loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Colon

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The only dislike I have is that the lid isn't as secure as I would like
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy yet light. Nice smooth finish. Really such a great deal when you only need a basic container. Not cheesy looking. I got the gold color.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful at a great price!!
customer_reviews.text: It is better than expected. I thought it would be smaller but it was a perfect size. Looks better than the picture. My mother was so happy with the purchase. We found a beautiful urn for my father for an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: fabiola

customer_reviews.title: The lid isn't that secure. If you have your loved ones in there that is very important.
customer_reviews.text: I find this product overall 👌, but thing the lid could be just a bit sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Further writer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Good Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these can't be beat, they don't appear cheap or flimsy and the velvet bag inside is a nice touch. Forget about spending 300 at a local funeral home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice urn for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a nice looking urn to bury my brother in at a Military cemetery that also didn’t cost a lot of money. This urn fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: SmartChoice Cremation Urns for Human Ashes Adult - Handcrafted Funeral Memorial Ashes Urn Classic Cremation Urn A Variety of Colors Available (Gold)
product_meta.description:
Color:GoldAre you looking for a cremation urn that will truly honor the memory of your loved one? Searching for a burial urn for human ashes that will hold adult human ashes while simultaneously not be an eyesore? Are you searching for a memorial cremation urn that will ensure that your loved one’s ashes are safe ?

 This SmartChoice decorative urn is a cremation urn for human adult ashes. This means that the urn can hold the ashes for any adult and has a capacity of roughly 200 cubic inches. This vase for ashes is made of metal and provides a strong and durable finish to the final resting place of your loved one. This human ash urn is made so that it will provide a secure resting place to your loved one and provide you with the secure knowledge that your loved one is resting in a good place.

 The timeless design is made to get along with any of your home or office décor and will definitely prove not to be an eyesore. The urn further provides a unique resting place and ensures that you know exactly where your loved one’s ashes are at all times. 

 You can also be sure that this urn won't ruin the surface of the furniture you put this urn on as it's base will protect the urn's resting place. Your loved one’s ashes are securely fastened with a handcrafted, tight-fitting, threaded lid. 

 Package Includes: 
1 x Cremation Urn 
1 x Velvet Bag
feature_bullets: Honor Your Loved One- Honor Your Loved One By Showcasing Their Ashes In This Beautiful And Elegant Handcrafted Urn Vase. The Timeless Design Has Been Made To Fit In With Any Home Or Office Décor. This Smartchoice Urn Is The Way To Go For Storing The Ashes Of Your Loved One.

High Quality Urn- This High Quality Adult Decorative Urn For Ashes Will Last You For Years To Come, Just Like The Cherished Memories You Have With Your Deceased Loved One. This Handcrafted Urn Is Made From Premium Metal That Will Not Chip Or Crack, And Is Made With A Durable Finish.

CLASSIC URN- This funeral urn is a rich gold color and will provide you with the same relief that your loved one provide you while they were alive. This urn will ensure that the final resting place of your loved one is as special as their life was.

SECURE BASE AND LID- This metal urn stands on a secure base to protect delicate surfaces that you might rest this urn onto. Your loved one’s ashes are also securely fastened with this tight-fitting, threaded lid. The dimensions of this urn are Height: 7.5 Width: 7 Depth: 7 and its capacity is 200 cubic inches.
Contact Us- Please Do Not Hesitate To Contact Us If You Have Any Issues With Your Cremation Urn And We Will Try Our Best To Rectify The Issue. We Aim For This To Be A No-hassle Purchase Throughout.
